text: notice of rent increase this section shall apply to all residential rental property except a nonrestricted property as defined in rsa b rental units in properties in buildings or apartment complexes containing a total of or fewer dwelling units provided the property is owned by a natural person and the owner does not rent more than dwelling units c occupancies described in rsa d shared facilities as defined in rsa e vacation or recreational rental units as defined in rsa f a dwelling unit in which due to a federal or state rent subsidy based on the tenant s household income the increase in the contract rent does not affect the amount paid by the tenant as his or her share of the rent g manufactured housing in a manufactured housing park governed by rsa notwithstanding the provisions of rsa iv or any other provision of law a no increase in a tenant s rent shall be effective and enforceable unless the tenant has been served with no less than days prior written notice of the amount and effective date of the rent increase such notice shall be served in accordance with the provisions of rsa b nothing in this paragraph shall be construed to permit a landlord to increase a tenant s rent during the term of a lease for a fixed term unless the lease expressly authorizes such an increase c this paragraph shall apply to any rent increase that becomes effective upon or after the expiration of the lease provided however that the landlord may provide the notice of rent increase required by this paragraph during the term of the lease d this paragraph shall not be construed to limit in any way the amount of a rent increase that is implemented in accordance with the notice requirements set forth in this paragraph
